actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the printing of additional copies of the Committee on Governmental Affairs hearing entitled "Prospects for Development of a United States HDTV Industry".

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of additional copies of "Prospects for Development of a United States HDTV Industry," a hearing held by the Committee on Governmental Affairs during the 101st Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the printing of additional copies of the Committee on Governmental Affairs hearing entitled "Prospects for Development of a United States HDTV Industry".
